title: Did the U.S. Government Purposely Poison 10,000 Americans During Prohibition?
subtitle: An Internet meme claims that government agencies tried to curb consumption of illegal liquor by adding poison.
author: David Emery
vclaim: In 1926, the federal government poisoned alcohol to curb consumption during Prohibition; by the time Prohibition ended in 1933, an estimated 10,000 people had died from this poisoning.
